entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 7. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Rain beginning this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming east 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
